Gau was a Netherese shipwright who worked at Gallery Steamers in Eileanar until its destruction in .
Gau served Stuckley as a work crew manager for the construction of flying ships used in Netheril. She worked alongside fellow managers Fourcrow, Apulee, and Bruck.
